other_tests.findings: Normal ventricular function, no evidence of valvular disease or left ventricular hypertrophy; interventricular septal wall thickness was 11 mm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Interventricular septal wall thickness increased to 14 mm on later examination.

other_tests.findings: Normal sinus rhythm and left-axis deviation.

Asymmetric left ventricular septal hypertrophy (maximum wall thickness, 21 mm) and mild left ventricular enlargement; no evidence of myocardial iron overload; areas of late gadolinium enhancement in the midwall consistent with fibrosis.
Segmental and subsegmental pulmonary emboli in the right lower lobe; no evidence of strain on the right side of the heart or pulmonary infarction.
Partially calcified, enhancing nodule (1.8 cm) in the right anterior mediastinum with 18F-fluorodeoxyglucose avidity.
Well-differentiated, low-grade thymic neuroendocrine tumor with ectopic corticotropin secretion.
